57.eng-name: One-fifth of Booty to the Cause of Allah (Khumus)

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Burda:`Aisha brought out to us a patched wool Len garment, and she said, "(It chanced that) the soul of Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) was taken away while he was wearing this." Abu-Burda added, "Aisha brought out to us a thick waist sheet like the ones made by the Yemenites, and also a garment of the type called Al- Mulabbada

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا ذُكِرَ مِنْ دِرْعِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم وَعَصَاهُ وَسَيْفِهِ وَقَدَحِهِ وَخَاتَمِهِ
chapter.eng-name: The armour of the Prophet (ﷺ) ﷺ
